about_the_game:
Reflex Unit: Strike Ops

In a near-future world shattered by cataclysmic events, powerful corporations have seized control, turning the remnants of civilization into their private fiefdoms. Among them, Neotech stands supreme, exploiting resources and oppressing the population with ruthless efficiency. But hope is not lost. Reflex Unit, a small but elite team of former operatives and specialists, has risen from the ashes to fight for freedom.

Features:

  • Tactical Vehicle Combat: Control multiple specialized vehicles, each offering unique gameplay dynamics.
  • Story Based Campaign: Uncover the mystery behind the sinister Neotech corporation and their plan for world domination.
  • Diverse Missions: Rescue prisoners, gather resources, assault enemy bases, and strike against Neotech's strongholds.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Balance speed, firepower, fuel and load capacity to overcome challenging missions.
  • Multiplayer: PVP and Co-op games modes.

Take command Of Reflex Unit

As the leader of Reflex Unit, you'll pilot unique vehicles across diverse missions. Scout enemy territory, execute daring rescues and unleash heavy firepower in a love letter to the classic 90s game Desert Strike.


Uncover Neotech's Dark Secret

Engage in high-stakes missions to disrupt Neotech's sinister operations. Discover the secrets behind their horrifying drone program and race against time to stop the deployment of their ultimate weapon. Uncover the mystery of what happened to your brother Clive, who was captured by Neotech several years ago.


Fight For Freedom

Experience a gripping narrative filled with betrayal, alliances, and personal vendettas. The stakes are high, and the urgency is real. Your strategic decisions and combat prowess will determine the fate of humanity.



Join Reflex Unit and lead the fight against Neotech Industries. The world is counting on you. Will you rise to the challenge?

content_descriptors.notes: The story of the game is about an evil corporation taking over the world and a group of helicopter pilots fighting them from a 3rd person high camera perspective. There is no depiction of violence to humans or animals in the game, only vehicles and robots are destroyed.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM

name: Reflex Unit : Strike Ops

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD APU with Zen 2 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tactical Vehicle Action! Featuring diverse missions; stage daring rescues, manage resources, assault enemy bases and fight back against a sinister enemy. Strategic single and multiplayer gameplay, balance your vehicles speed, firepower, fuel and load capacity to overcome challenging missions.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese
